definitions: Give a spoken or written account of something that one has observed, heard, done, or investigated.
Present oneself to a person or at a place when expected or required.
Be accountable to (a superior) for one's work and be supervised by them.
Make a formal complaint about (someone or something).
examples: The committee will report its findings next week.
He reported for duty at 8 AM.
She reports directly to the CEO.
I need to report this incident to the police.
Many companies report strong earnings this quarter.
